Mi ibda iteddu yides, inna: "a mmi! Nek wala$, di targit, a k zlu$. Muqel d acu twalav"? Inna: "a baba! Exdem ayen ik ippumôen; ad iyi tafev, ma Irad Öebbi, seg iûebôiyen

Nburek iten, neppa d Isêaq. Si tarwa nnsen, iban win iddan d ubrid, iban win idensen iman is
Ni$ N$at Musa akked Haôun

Nefka yasen afus, d$a d nitni ay d imerbaê
Nefka yasen Tazmamt ipbegginen
Nebbwi ten d ubrid uwqim

talwit i Musa, akked Haôun

Ih, Ilyas ar seg imazanen
Mi inna i ugdud is: "day ur tepêezziben ara
Day la tepnujum $eô Baâla, a ppeooem Üûam ixellaqen
Öebbi, Mass nnwen, Mass n lejdud nnwen imezwura
Skaddben t. S tidep, nitni a d rsen
kkes ed imdanen n Öebbi, izedganen

Aql akwen la tleêêum fellasen, deg uzal

Ih, Yunes ar seg imazanen
Mi irwel ar sfina iççuôen

Isseblaâ it uslem, u neppa degs tiyta

ad iqqim deg uâabbuv is, ar ass n tu$alin nnsen
Nveggeô it id, s aqeôqaô, d amuvin

Nuzen it ar twinas igima, uger
Umnen. Neooa ten zzhan kan tallit
Steqsi ten maday, i Mass ik, tullas; i nitni, arrac
Ne$ Nexleq lmalayek d nnta, nitni d inagan
Day, s tkerkas nnsen, ihi, a d inin
Iurew ed Öebbi"? Nitni, s tidep, d ikeddaben
Ismenyaf tullas i warrac
Acu ikwen iu$en? Amek tepêuddum
Day ur d tesmektayem ara
Ne$ tesâam adabu n ûûeê
Aset ed s tezmamt nnwen, ma tessawalem tidep
Gren d nnesba garaS d leonun. Irna leonun éôan ara d rsen

Kkes ed imdanen n Öebbi izedganen

ur d tesskarem ahewwel, mgal iS
siwa win ara iô$en di tmes

lemmer day $uône$ asmekti seg imezwura
a nili, war ccekk, d imdanen iâaôviyen n Öebbi
Nekôen T. Deqqal ad éôen

Ih, d nitni ara ipwasellken

Ïîixeô asen kra n tallit
Ssiked, deqqal ad walin

Tifrat $ef imazanen

Ü. S Leqwôan id ismektayen
Xaîi, wid ijehlen, atnan di tem$weô d ticuîna
Acêal isuta ay Nesqucc, uqbel nnsen! Ssawlen d. Ur mazal akud i leslak
Wehmen, iusa ten id uneddaô segsen. Nnan ijehliyen: "wagi d aseêêar, d akeddab
Aâni ad irr iôebbiten, d Öebbi Yiwen? Ayagi d ayen issewhamen
Kkren imeqwôanen segsen, nnan: "elêut, illit d imezgiyen ar iôebbiten nnwen. Ayagi, d ayen iwatan
Ur nesli i waya, di ddin aneggaru. Ihi, aya, siwa asnulfu
Day, garane$, d neppa iwumi d irs usmekti"? Xaîi, nitni di ccekk, $ef usmekti W, mazal ur jeôôben ara aâaqeb iW
Ne$ sâan lexzayen uêunu n Mass ik, Uzmir, A$eyyat
Ne$, nnsen tagelda n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen? Anef ad alin ihi, s imraren
Nitni siwa d iâeskôiwen imexsuôen, seg ikabaren
Zwaren ten id, ar uskiddeb, agdud n Nuê, Âad, Ferâun bu ibudiden
Tamud, agdud n Luî, At Laika; d widak ay d ikabaren
Akw, skaddben imazanen, ihi, iwata uâaqeb iW
Wigi, ad gganin kan ti$ôi yiwet, ur as ippili wallus
Nnan: "a Mass nne$! £iwwel ane$ deg umur nne$, uqbel ass iqeîîiyen
Eûbeô i wayen d qqaôen. Mmekti d amdan nne£ Dawed, bab n tezmert. Ih, Neppa ippales
Ih, Nêeppem i idurar ad sbuccuâen yides, tameddit, tafara
Ifôax mlalen. Akw, i Neppa, ppalsen
Nesseohed tagelda s, Nefka ias ûûwab, awal iqaâden
Ma ibbwev ik id usali n yixûimen, mi ulin ar tmezgida
Mi kecmen ar Dawed, iugad iten. Nnan: "ur ppagwad, d sin ixûimen, yiwen degne$, ijuô $ef wayev. Eêkem garane$ s tidep, war taneêyaft. Enhu ya$ s abrid umâin
Ihi, gma yagi, isâa tza u tzat n wulli, nek tixsi yiwet. Inna yi d: kwellef iyi p. Irna yi s wawal

Inna: "ni$ idens ik s usuter n texsi inek, a p irnu ar wulli ines. Aîas n yicriken i ippemjuôen, siwa wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, drus nnsen ay llan". Ifhem Dawed Njeôôeb it kan; iste$feô Mass is, i$li, iîîanez, indem
Nsemmeê as ayagi. Ih, i neppa, $uône£, amkan n tu$alin aqôib, umâin

A Dawed, Nerra k, ih, d agensas di tmurt. Ëudd ger imdanen s tidep, ur îîafaô lhawiyya, a k tetlef seg ubrid n Öebbi. Ihi, wid innetlafen seg ubrid n Öebbi, fellasen aâaqeb uqsiê, imi ppun ass iqeîîiyen
Ur Nexliq tamurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen, di rrayaâ, akken nwan wid ijehlen. A tawa$it n tmes, i wid ijehlen
Day a Nerr wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, am wid issefsaden di ddunit? Ne$ a Nerr wid ipêezziben am laâôuô
Tazmamt Nessers ak p id, teôqa, iwakken ad meyyzen issekniyen is, a d mmektin uâqilen
N$at Dawed s Sliman, amdan ukiys ippalsen
Mi s d sseknen, tameddit, tigmarin lâali
inna: "nek, smenyafe$ tayri n wayla, i usmekti n Mass iw, armi sberbren fellasent
Erret pent id $uôi". Igezm asent ivaôen, timegrav
Ni$, Njeôôeb Sliman; Nessers loeppa af usgeld is. Iu$al indem
Inna: "a Mass iw! Semmeê iyi, £it iyi s tgelda ur nepûaê yiwen, deffir i. S tidep, Keçç d A$iyyat
Nenub fellas s wavu. Ipûuvu, s lameô is, d abeêri, s anda i s ihwa
Ccwaîen akw ibennun, ip$emmisen
Wiyad pwarzen, s slasel
Tagi d tikci nne£. Efk ne$ eîîef, war aktili
Ih, i neppa, $uône£, amkan n tu$alin aqôib, umâin
Mmekti d amdan nne£ Yub, mi inâaô Mass is: "nek, iêuza yi Cciîan, s cedda akked uâaqeb
Aâfes s uvaô ik, wagi d amkan semmven, i tarda u i tissit
N$at it s twacult is, akked yides tin i p icban, d aêunu s$uône£, d asmekti i uâqilen
Eddem deg ufus ik taseîîa, ewwet yis ur êennet". Ni$ Nufa t d aûebôi, d amdan amxallef ippalsen
Mmekti d imdanen nne£: Ibôahim, Isêaq, Iaâqub. D imawlan n tezmert akked yiéôi
Ih, Nûeffa ten, s ûûfawa usmekti n Uxxam
Nitni, $uône£, war ccekk, seg wid iufraren, i Nefren
Mmekti d: Ismaâil, Lyasaâ, Du-al-Kifl. Akw, seg wid Nefren
Wagi d asmekti. Ih, i wid ipêezziben, tisin igerzen mavi
leonanat n Âaden. Llin asen tibbura
Ad ttekkin dinna. Ad ssutren degsen; izwayen s lufa, akked tisit
£uôsen, sut wallen ibran, ppizyiwin
D wagi i wen ippuwaââden, i wass iqeîîiyen
D wagi, s tidep, ay d l$it nne£, ur nepfukku
Akka. Wanag, i iqehhaôen, tisin icemten mavi
Loahennama, ad degs ô$en; a yir usu
Akka, ad jeôôben aman ippayzagen, akked wid ipfuêun
akked wayen nniven i ten icban, d tiyugiwin
Atan urbaâ i iddehmen yidwen, ur anûuf yissen. Ih, di tmes ad ô$en
Nnan: "xaîi, ur anûuf yiswen, kunwi! D kunwi i $ p id iheggan". A yaxxam adiran
Nnan: "a Mass nne$! Sâaddi berdayen aâaqeb n tmes, $ef wid i $ d iheggan aya
Nnan: "acu i $ iu$en, ur nwala ara irgazen, i nella nêesb iten seg imcumen mavi
Day nemsexxeô fellasen, ne$ dergen i wallen
Ih, aya d tidep, d amqellaâ n at tmes
Ini: "nek, d aneddaô kan. Ur illi ôebbi siwa Öebbi, Yiwen, Aqehhaô
Mass n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen, Uzmir Ipsemmiêen
Ini: "d asali ameqwôahan
Kunwi, teooam t
Ur illi wayen éôi$ $eô le$wat aâlayen meôôa, mi mqellaân
Ppuweêêa$ d kan, ar nek d aneddaô ipbegginen
Mi Inna Mass ik i lmalayek: "Nek ad Xelqe$ amdan, si talaxt
Mi t Mesle$, Suve$ degs, si ôôuê iW, îinzemt $uôes, s lekni
Knant akw lmalayek, akken ma llant
siwa Iblis i izuxxen, illa seg ijehliyen
Inna: "A Iblis, w ik igedlen lekni i win Xelqe$ s ifassen iW? Tzuxxev, ne$ telliv seg wid iufraren
Inna: "Nek ife$ t. Txelqev iyi si tmes, Txelqev t si talaxt
Inna: "Effe$ segs, keçç d imenfi
Inna: "fellak xezzu, alamma d ass iqeîîiyen
Inna: "A Mass iw, eoo iyi ar ass ideg ara d kkren
Inna: "keçç, ih, seg wid Ooi
ar ass n wukud ipwassnen
Inna: "s tezmert iK, a ten $ewwu$, akken ma llan
siwa imdanen iK izedganen segsen
Inna: "tidep, d tidep ay Nni
Ad Acare$ Loahennama yissek, akked wid, segsen, i k ivefôen, akken ma llan
Ini: "ur awen ssutre$ taqdiât af waya. Ur lli$, nek, seg wid ippestaâmilen
Neppa, s tidep, d asmekti kan i imavalen
Mi tâadda tallit, war ccekk, a kwen id iawev usali s
Tarusi n Tezmamt s$uô Öebbi, Uzmir, Bab n ûûwab
Ih, Nessader ak d Tazmamt, s tidep. Ihi, aâbed Öebbi, s laâqida i Neppa

Day maççi i Öebbi laâqida? Wid ippaddamen imawlan, war Neppa, nnan: "naâbed iten kan, iwakken ad a$ rnun aseqôeb ar Öebbi". Ih, Öebbi ad Iêudd garasen, $ef wayen i$ef mgarraden. Öebbi, war ccekk, ur Inehhu win illan d akeddab, d ajehli
Lemmer Ib$i Öebbi ad Isâu aqcic, yili Ifren, deg wayen Ixelleq, ayen i S ihwan. Gedha s yiS! Neppa d Öebbi Yiwen, Aqehhaô
Ixleq tamurt akked igenwan, s tidep. Innev Iv i wass, Innev ass i yiv. Iêeppem i yiîij akked waggur, ad lêun, yal wa, ar lajel ipwassnen. Day Neppa maççi d Uzmir Ipsemmiêen

Ixelq ikwen si yiwen n lxelq. Irra, segs, tislit is. Issers awen d îam n tyugiwin n lmal. Ixelq ikwen di tâabbuvin n tyimmatin nnwen, lxelq deffir lxelq, di krav n tellisat. D wagi ay d Öebbi, Mass nnwen. IneS tagelda, ur illi ôebbi siwa Neppa. Amek ihi tugim

Ma tjehlem, Öebbi ur kwen Iêwao ara. Ur Ipôadi tijehli i imdanen iS. Ma tesnemmrem, a kwen Iôavi. Ur ipbibbi yiwen taâkkwemt n wayev; sinna, ar Mass nnwen tu$alin nnwen; ad awen Imel acu txeddmem. Ih, Neppa, Issen i illan deg idmaren

Amdan, ma iêuza t ccqa, ad inuj ar Mass is, d ucâif $uôes; sinna, ma I$at it s$uôeS, ad ippu ayen i$ef inuj $uôeS, uqbel; ad irr i Öebbi tanudda, ad innetlaf seg ubrid iS. Ini: "zzhu cwiî di tijehli k, ihi, keçç seg wat tmes
Day win ippanzen deg iv, ikna u ibedd, ipêebbiô i laxeôt, issaram aêunu n Mass is…? Ini: "day âadlen wid issnen akked wid ur nessin? Ay d ismektayen, kan, d uâqilen
Ini: "a yimdanen iW iumnen, êezzbet i Mass nnwen. Ayen ilhan i wid imaânen di ddunit agi. Tamurt n Öebbi tewsaâ. Ihi, arraz, war aktili, ad ippunefk i iûebôiyen
Ini: "nek pwamôe$ d ad âabde$ Öebbi, s laâqida i Neppa
Pwamôe$ d, ad ili$ d amvuâ amenzu
Ini: "nek, ugade$, ma aâûa$ Mass iw, aâaqeb n wass ameqwôaêan
Ini: "ad âabde$ Öebbi, s laâqida i Neppa
Ihi, âabdet i wen ihwan, war Neppa". Ini: "imexsuôen d wid iwedôen iman nnsen, akked twacult nnsen, ass n tnekra". Ni$ d tagi ay d taxessaôt n ûûeê
A$embabu n tmes, sennig sen, wayev seddawat sen. Ayagi, Issagwad yis Öebbi imdanen iS: a yimdanen iW, êezzbet iyI
Wid ijunben aâbad iôebbiten n tkerkas, u iutuben Öebbi, a ten id ias lfeôê. Ihi, ssefôeê imdanen iW
i issemêasen i wawal, teddun d ûûam ines. D wigi i Inha Öebbi, d wigi ay d uâqilen
Day win i$ef ippuseyya ad isâaddi aâaqeb, day a psellkev keçç, win illan di tmes
Ma d wid iêezzben i Mass nnsen, ad sâun ti$uôfatin, bnant ta sennig ta, isaffen seddawat sent ppazzalen, d lemâahda n Öebbi. Öebbi ur Ixeîîu i lemâahda

Ur twalav ara, Öebbi Isse$li d aman, seg igenni, Issekcem iten ad sswen akal. Sinna, yissen, a d Issuffe$ im$an n yal ini, ara iu$alen ad isliwen. A ten twaliv d iwôa$en, sinna, a ten Irr d iquôanen. Deg waya, s tidep, asmekti i uâqilen
Day win iwumi Illi Öebbi, idmaren is, ar wannuz, d$a neppa di tafat s$uô Mass is…? A ssxev n at wulawen iqquôen, ur d smektayen Öebbi! Widak di ttelfan n ûûeê

Issader ed Öebbi ûûam n wawal. Tazmamt, degs acbi, allus. Ad ccirwen segs igwelman akked wulawen n wid ippagwaden Mass nnsen, sinna, igwelman akked wulawen nnsen ad iêninen ar usmekti n Öebbi. D tagi ay d nnhaya n Öebbi. Inehhu yis, win i S ihwan. Win Itlef Öebbi, ur illi wa ara t inhun
Day win ipêezziben, s wudem is, seg uâaqeb ucmit, ass n tnekra…? Ad inin i imednas: "jeôôbet ayen tkeppbem
Skaddben wid i ten id izwaren. Iusa ten id uâaqeb, seg wanda ur bnin
Issukk fellasen Öebbi aâaqeb, di tmeddurt n ddunit; war ccekk, aâaqeb n laxeôt iugar it, lemmer éeôôen
Ni$ Nefka i imdanen, di Leqwôan agi, yal amedya, amar a d mmektin
Leqwôan s taâôabt, ur degs tiââawji; amar ad êezzben
Ifka d Öebbi amedya n urgaz icerken akked wid ipmeréan, u argaz di tifrat akked yiwen urgaz. Day âadlen sin imedyaten? Ccekôan i Öebbi. Xaîi, tegwti degsen ur ssinen
War ccekk, keçç a ppemmtev, nitni ad mmten
Sinna, kunwi, ass n tnekra, ar Mass nnwen, a ppemqellaâm
Anwa i idensen sennig win iskaddben af Öebbi, iskaddben tidep ma tusa t id? Day maççi di Loahennama, i illa uxxam ijehliyen
Wid id iusan s tidep, u pputebbten yis, wigi d wid ipêezziben
Ad sâun ayen b$an, ar Mass nnsen. D wagi ay d arraz iâaôviyen
Iwakken ad asen Ikkes Öebbi, ayen xedmen adiran mavi; a ten I$it s wayen xeddmen d amxallef
Day ur Ipqam ara Öebbi amdan iS? La k ssagwaden s wid, war Neppa. Win Itlef Öebbi, ur illi w ara t inhun
Win Inha Öebbi, ur illi w ara t itelfen. Ni$ Öebbi d Uzmir, Bab n ppaô

Ma testeqsav ten: "anwa i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan? Ad inin, war ccekk: d Öebbi". Ini: "ma twalam wigi tnaâôem, war Öebbi, day zemren, ma Ib$a yi Öebbi ccqa, ad kksen ccqa S? Ne$, ma Ib$a yi aêunu, ad ssbeîlen aêunu S"? Ini: "Iqennaâ iyi Öebbi; fellaS ay ppeklen wid ipkalen
Ini: "a yagdud iw! Xedmet akken tennumen, nek la xeddme$". Deqqal a ppeéôem
anwa u$uô ara d ias uâaqeb ara t isdullen, u$uô ara d irs uâaqeb imezgi
Ih, Nessader ed $uôek, Tazmamt i medden, s tidets. Win ipwanhan, i iman is, win innetlafen, innetlaf kan, mgal is. Ur telliv, keçç, d awkil nnsen
Öebbi Ippaddam leôwaê mara mmten, akked wid ur nemmut, deg ives nnsen. Iâatteq wid i$ef Iseyya tameppant, Ippara d wiyav, ar lajel ipwassnen. Ih, deg wayagi, ard issekniyen i ugdud ipmeyyizen
Ne$ ad ddmen, war Öebbi, imcafâan? Ini: "i ma ur sâin acemma, ur fhimen
Ini: "akw ccafuâa n Öebbi. IneS tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan. Sinna, $uôeS ara tu$alem
Mara d Ipwadder Öebbi Yiwen, ad zemven wulawen n wid ur numin ara s laxeôt. Ma pwadren d wid, war Neppa, imiren nitni ad ceôêen
Ini: "a Öebbi! Axellaq n tmurt akked igenwan, Amusnaw n wayen iffren d wayen ivehôen, d Keçç ara Iêudden ger imdanen iK, $ef wayen llan mgarraden
Wid idensen, lemmer nnsen ayen akw i illan di tmurt, rnu yas am neppa, ur ten id ifeddu, seg uâaqeb ucmit, ass n tnekra. Ad asen d iban, s$uô Öebbi, ayen i$ef ur bnin
Ad asen d banent tucmitin kesben, ad asen innev wayen i$ef ttahan
Ma iêuza umdan ccqa, ad a£ d inâaô. Sinna, ma Nezger tacvaî nne£ fellas, ad yini: "tusa yi d kan si tmusni". Xaîi! D ajeôôeb, maca aîas degsen ur ssinen
Ni$ nnan t id imezwura nnsen. Acu i sen d ibbwi wayen keppben
Iwwet iten wayen kesben n tucmitin. Wid idensen, seg wigi, a ten iwwet wayen kesben n tucmitin. Ur zmiren ad sfunngen
Day ur éôin ara ar Öebbi Ip$iti win i S ihwan, u Iwezzen? Ih, deg waya, ard issekniyen i ugdud iumnen
Ini: "a yimdanen iw i ipêawalen mgal iman nnsen! Ur ppayset aêunu n Öebbi. Ih, Öebbi Ipsemmiê akw ibekkaven. Ih, Neppa Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Steôoâet i Mass nnwen, anzet aS, uqbel a kwen id ias uâaqeb, d$a ula ikwen isellken
Ddut d ûûam n wayen i wen d irsen, s$uô Mass nnwen, uqbel a kwen id ias uâaqeb, deqzalla, kunwi ur tebnim
u a d yini ôôuê: "a ssexv iw, $ef wayen stehza$ ar loiha n Öebbi! Lli$, s tidep, seg wid ittihin
Ne$ a d yini: "lemmer iyi Inha Öebbi, yili lli$ seg wid ipêezziben
Ne$ a d yini mara iwali aâaqeb: "lemmer iyi illi wallus, ad ili$ si lâuûam
Xaîi! Usan k id issekniyen iW, teskaddbev ten, tzuxxev, telliv seg ijehliyen
Ass n tnekra, a pwaliv berrikit wudmawen n wid id igren tikerkas af Öebbi. Day maççi di Loahennama, i illa uxxam imzuxiyen
Ad Isellek Öebbi wid iêezzben; ar rebêen. Ur ten ikkat wugur, ur $webbnen
Öebbi Ixleq yal cci. Neppa d Awkil n yal cci
IneS tsura n tmurt akked igenwan. Wid inekôen issekniyen n Öebbi, widak d imexsuôen
Ini: "day ad yi tamôem ad âabde$, war Öebbi, a wid ur nessin
Ni$ iusa k id uweêêi, u $eô wid i k izwaren. Ma tcurkev, ad mêun igiten ik, a ppiliv seg imexsuôen
Xaîi! Aâbed Öebbi. Ili seg wid isnemmiren
Ur qudôen ara Öebbi, azal n lqedô iS. Akw tamurt, ass n tnekra, di tumeét iS. Igenwan ad nnefvasen deg ufus iS ayeffus. Gedha s yiS! I Aâlay sennig wayen pcaraken
Aûuvu di lbuq: ad ixsef i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt, kkes ed i S ihwan i Öebbi. Aûuvu nniven: nitni a d kkren pmuqulen
A pfeooeo tmurt, si tafat n Mass is. A d ters Tezmamt, a d awin lambiyya akked inagan. Ad âaddin di ccôaâ, s tidep, ur pwadensen
Yal yiwen ad i$ellet ayen ixdem. Neppa, Yif akw akken Issen, d acu xeddmen

Ad pwanehôen wid ijehlen, d igrawen, ar Loahennama. Mi bbwven $uôes, u llint tebbura s, ad asen inin iâssasen is: "day ur kwen in usan ara imazanen, segwen, mmalen awen issekniyen n Mass nnwen, nedôen kwen af temlilit n wass nnwen agi"? A d inin: "Ih. Maca, ad iûaô wawal uâaqeb, af ijehliyen
A d inin: "kecmet si tebbura, ar Loahennama! Degs, wekkôet". Ay d ucmit uxxam n imzuxiyen
Wid iêezzben i Mass nnsen, ad pwanehôen ar Loennet, d igrawen. Mi bbwven $uôes, u llint tebbura s, ad asen inin iâssasen is: "tifrat fellawen, tgerzem; kecmet ep, twekkôem
Ad inin: "ccekôan i Öebbi i $ Issawven lemâahda S. Ifka ya$ tamurt d lweôt; a nili, di Loennet, anda i $ ihwa. A yarraz asaâdi n wid ixeddmen lxiô
A pwaliv lmalayek zzint ed i usgeld, sbuccuâent s ccekôan Mass nnsent. Iâadda ccôaâ garasen, s tidep. Ad inin: "a neckeô Öebbi, Mass imavalen
Ëm
Tarusi n Tezmamt, s$uô Öebbi, Uzmir, Amusnaw
Ipsemmiêen tuccva, Iqeblen nndama, Ipâaqaben s teqseê, Bab n terkunt. Ur illi ôebbi siwa Neppa. £uôeS taggara
Siwa wid ijehlen i ipnamaren $ef issekniyen n Öebbi. Ur k ip$uôôu ucali nnsen, di tmurt
Uqbel nitni, agdud n Nuê, akked ikabaren deffir sen, skaddben. Yal lois iclaâ ad ixvef amazan is. Ipnamar s tkerkas, iwakken, s yissent, ad iveggeô tidep. Ëekme$ ten. A tiyta W imiren
Akka iûaô wawal n Mass ik, af wid ijehlen. Nitni, war ccekk, d at tmes

Tid irefden asgeld, akked tid i s izzin, sbuccuâen s ccekôan Mass nnsent, umnent yiS. Ssuturent ad pwasemmêen wid iumnen: "a Mass nne$! Terriv yal cci d aêunu, u d tamusni. Semmeê i wid isteôoâen u ddan d ubrid iK; Sellek iten seg uâaqeb n wu$ud
A Mass nne$! Ssekcem iten ar leonanat n Âaden, i Tâahdev, i nitni, u i iâaôviyen seg ibabaten nnsen, tilawin nnsen, tarwa nnsen. Keçç, ih, d Uzmir, d Bab n ûûwab
Aâteq iten si tucmitin. Win Tâatqev, assen, si tucmitin, ni$ Têunev fellas. D wagi ay d rrbeê ameqwôaêan
Ad pwanecden wid ijehlen: "taâdawt n Öebbi te$leb taâdawt bbwaygarawen. Mi tepwanecdem ar liman, tugim
A d inin: "a Mass nne$! Ten$iv a$ berdayen, Tessidrev a$ berdayen. Nqaôô s ibekkaven nne$. Day illa ubrid n tuff$a
Akka, imi mara ipwanâaô Öebbi Yiwen, kunwi tjehlem. Mara S pcaraken, kunwi tumnem. Aêuddu ar Öebbi Aâlayen, Ameqwôan
D Neppa i wen Issnaâtan issekniyen iS. Issadar awen d l$it, seg igenni. Siwa win isteôoiâen, id ismektayen
Nujet $uô Öebbi, s laâqida i Neppa, xas ugin ijehliyen
Aâlayen nnig idurra, Bab n usgeld, Ippak ôôuê s lameô iS, i win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS, iwakken ad indeô af wass umlili
ass ideg ara d awven, ur illi wayen iffren, degsen, i Öebbi. W ip ilan tgelda, assen? D Öebbi, Yiwen, Aqehhaô
Ass ideg ara ippuqeîîi yal iman $ef wayen ikseb; ur ippili ddens assen. Ih, Öebbi Ip$awal deg uqeîîi
Nabi ten af ass aqôib, ideg ulawen ad rewlen s igerjumen, ad qebôen. Ur ippilli i imednas, uêbib ne$ amcafaâ, iwumi ara ssemêessen
Issen nncub n yiéôi, akked wayen teffren idmaren
Öebbi Iferru s tidep. Wid ipnujun ar war Neppa, ur qeîîun acemma. Ih, Öebbi d Win Isellen, Ipwalin
Day ur nudan ara tamurt, ad walin amek tevôa d wid i ten id izwaren. Llan ifen ten tazmert, akked lateô, di tmurt. Issemêelleq asen Öebbi, ilmend ibekkaven nnsen. Ur asen illi umêareb, mgal Öebbi
Akka, acku ppasen $uôsen, imazanen nnsen, s ubeggen, u nitni jehlen. Issemêelleq asen Öebbi. Ih, Neppa, d Uzmir, d Bab uâaqeb uqsiê
Ni$ Nuzen ed Musa s issekniyen nne£, s udabu iberrzen
ar Ferâun, Haman, akked Qaôun. Nnan: "d aseêêar, d akeddab
Mi sen d iusa, s tidep s $uône£, nnan: "en$et arrac n wid iumnen yides, ssidret tilawin nnsen". Tandit ijehliyen siwa di ttelfan
Inna Ferâun: "anfet iyi ad n$e$ Musa, xas ad inuj ar Mass is. Ugade$, nek, ad ibeddel ddin nnwen, ne$ a d issekcem lefsad di tmurt
Inna Musa: "nek, ad iyi Iûûeô Mass iw u Mass nnwen, si yal amzuxi, ur numin s wass uqeîîi

Inna urgaz lmumen, i iffren liman is, si twacult n Ferâun: "day a ppen$em argaz, imi d iqqaô: Mass iw d Öebbi, u irna ibbwi yawen d abeggen, s$uô Mass nnwen? Ma iskaddeb, lkedb is fellas. Ma issawel tidep, a kwen iêaz kra seg wayen ikwen issagwad. Öebbi ur Inehhu amaâfun iskiddiben
A yagdud iw! Assa, nnwen tagelda, tufrarem di tmurt. W ad a$ isellken si tiyta n Öebbi, ma tusa ya$ d"? Inna d Ferâun: "i wen ssekne$ ayen kan wala$; s anda i kwen nehhu$, siwa ar ubrid imaânen
Inna d win iumnen: "a yagdud iw! Nek, ugade$ fellak tin n wass ikabaren
akken tevôa d ugdud n Nuê, Âad, Tamud, akked wid i ten id ivefôen. Öebbi ur Ib$a ara ddens i imdanen
A yagdud iw! Nek ugade$, ay kwen ippa$en, ass umnamar
ass ideg ara trewlem ar deffir. Ur awen illi umêareb mgal Öebbi. Ur illi nnahi i win Itlef Öebbi
Ni$ iusa kwen id Yusef, zik, s ubeggen. Tezgam di ccekk, $ef wayen i wen d ibbwi. Armi immut, tennam: "ur d Ippazen ara Öebbi amazan, deffir es, d awez$i". Akka i Itellif Öebbi amaâfun amcekki
Wid ipnamaren issekniyen n Öebbi, ur ten id iusi udabu, nezzeh ara ten i$unfu Öebbi, akked wid iumnen. Akka ara Icemmaâ Öebbi, yal ul amzuxi, aâfrit
Inna Ferâun: "a Haman, bnu yi lbeôo, amar ad awve$ ar iberdan
iberdan igenwan. Ad ali$ ar Öebbi n Musa. Nek êesbe$ t d akeddab". Akka i s ippucebbeê i Ferâun, igi s ucmit. Ippuveôôef seg ubrid. Tandit n Ferâun, siwa taxeûûart
Inna d win iumnen: "a yagdud iw! Ddu yidi, a k nhu$ s abrid umâin
A yagdud iw! Tameddurt agi, di ddunit, d zzhu kan; wanag laxeôt d axxam n leqôaô
Win ixedmen tucmip, ad ippuqeîîi, kan, s tin i p icban. Wid ixedmen ayen ilhan, d ddkeô ne$ d nnta, u nitni umnen, widak ad kecmen Loennet; din, ad aten $iten, war aktili
A yagdud iw! Acu iyi bbwin, a kwen neccde$ ar leslak; kunwi, a yi tneccdem ar tmessi
A yi tneccdem ad aâûu$ Öebbi, ad aS carke$ ayen ur ssine$. Nek, neccde$ kwen ar Uzmir Ipsemmiêen
War ccekk, ayen u$uô a yi tneccdem, ur as iwata unuju di ddunit, u di laxeôt. Ih, tu$alin nne$ ar Öebbi. Imaâfan ard at tmes
A d tesmektim ayen i wen qqaôe$. Öôay iw fki$ t i Öebbi. Ni$ Öebbi Ipwali imdanen
Isellek it Öebbi si tucmitin i undin. I$wellef lois n Ferâun, s uâaqeb iugaren wiyav
times. Ad pwafessren degs, ûûbeê, tameddit. Ass ideg ara d ias yimir: "ekcem, a lois n Ferâun, aâaqeb uwâiô mavi
Mara ppemqellaâen di tmes, ad inin uôhifen i imzuxiyen: "ni$ nella nedda yidwen. Ma tzemrem, kunwi, ad a$ tesneqsem cwiî, si tmes
A d inin imzuxiyen: "aql a$, akw, degs. S tidep, Öebbi Iêudd ger imdanen
Ad inin wid illan di tmes, i iâessasen n Loahennama: "naâôet Mass nnwen, ad a$ Issifes ibwass uâaqeb
Ad inin: "day ur kwen id usan ara imazanen nnwen, s ubeggen"? Ad inin: "ih". Ad inin: "naâret"! Ar ttelfan, kan, tanaârit ijehliyen
War ccekk, a Nsellek imazanen nne£, akked wid iumnen, di tmeddurt n ddunit, u deg wass ideg ara d bedden inagan
ass ideg ur infaâ uste$feô imednas. Ad pwaxzun, ad zed$en deg uxxam ucmit mavi
Ni$ Nefka, i Musa, nnhaya. Nefka, i At Isôail, Tazmamt d lweôt
D nnhaya, u d asmekti i uâqilen
Eûbeô. Ih, lemâahda n Öebbi, d tidep. Ssuter ssmaê ubekkav ik. Sbuccaâ s ccekôan Mass ik, tameddit, taûebêit
Ih, wid ipnamaren issekniyen n Öebbi, ur ten id iusi udabu, d tem$weô kan i illan deg idmaren nnsen; ur as ssawven. Ggani Öebbi, Neppa, s tidep, Isell, Ipwali
Ih, lxelq n tmurt akked igenwan iugar lxelq n imdanen, maca aîas n imdanen ur éôin
Ur iaâdil ara uder$al akked win ipwalin, wid iumnen u xeddmen ayen ilhan, akked bu tucmitin. Cwiî id tesmektayem
Ihi, imir a d ias, ur illi ccekk fellas, maca tegwti n imdanen ur uminen
Inna Mass nnwen: "naâret iyI, ad awen d Jawbe$. Wanag wid igelzen aâbed iW, ad kecmen Loahennama, d imedlulen
Öebbi i wen Irran iv, i ureyyeê degs, ass i tmu$li. Öebbi, ih, d Bab n lfevl i imdanen, maca tegwti n imdanen, ur snemmiren
D wagi ay d Öebbi, Mass nnwen. Ixleq yal cci, ur illi ôebbi, siwa Neppa. Ihi, acimi tezzim akin
Akka ay wexxôen wid iugin issekniyen n Öebbi
Öebbi i wen Irran tamurt d leqôaô, igenni d ssqef; ikwen Imeslen. Iûeggem udem nnwen. I$at ikwen s wayen ilhan. D wagi ay d Öebbi, Mass nnwen. D Asaâdi Öebbi, Mass imavalen
Neppa d Amuddir, ur illi ôebbi siwa Neppa. Ihi, naâôet eP, s lâaqida i Neppa. Ccekôan i Öebbi, Mass imavalen
Ini: "nek, ipwakkes iyi uâbad n wid tnaârem war Öebbi, mi yi d iusa ubeggen, s$uô Mass iw. Pwamôe$ d, ad anze$ i Mass imavalen

Neppa, ikwen Ixelqen seg wakal; sinna, si tiqqit; sinna, seg urgen; sinna, Issuffe$ ikwen id d igwerdan; sinna, a ppim$uôem; sinna, a ppu$alem d im$aôen. Kra segwen, pmeppaten uqbel. Iwakken a ppawvem ar lajel ipwassnen. Amendeô ma a pfehmem
D Neppa i Issidiren, i Ineqqen. Ma Iseyya d lameô, ad as Yini kan: "ili"! Ad yili
Day ur twalav ara amek ssuff$en i ubrid, wid ipnamaren issekniyen n Öebbi
Wid iskaddben Tazmamt, akked wayen i$ef id Nuzen imazanen nne£, deqqal ad éôen
Mara pwazu$ôen, s teqlavin d slasel
ar waman ippayzagen; sinna, ar tmes, ad pwaveggôen
sinna, ad asen inin: "anda t wayen tepcarakem
war Öebbi"? A d inin: "dergen fella$. Xaîi! Ur illi wayen u$uô nepnuju, zik". Akka i Itellif Öebbi ijehliyen
Akka, $ef wayen tzehhum di tmurt, ur teklalem, akked wayen tqebêem

Eûbeô, war ccekk, lemâahda n Öebbi d tidep. Ad ak Nessken kra n wayen i sen Nâahed, ne$ a Neddem ôôuê ik. £uône£ ara d u$alen

Öebbi i wen Ifkan lmal i rekba nnwen. Segsen teppeppem

Day ur nudan ara tamurt ad walin amek tevôa d wid i ten id izwaren. Llan ifen ten akken îîuqten, ifen ten tazmert akked lateô di tmurt. Ulay sen d ibbwi wayen la keppben
Mi ten id usan imazanen nnsen s ubeggen, feôêen s tmusni i illan $uôsen. Izzi fellasen wayen i$ef ppemsexxiôen

Nnan: "ulawen nne$ ddurin i wayen i$eô la $ tneccdev; di tmejjin nne$: tiâéegt; garane$ yidek: sîeô. Ihi, exdem, nekwni la nxeddem
Ini: "nek d amdan kan, am kunwi. Weêêan iyi d kan ar Öebbi nnwen, d Öebbi Yiwen. Sweqmet $uôeS, ssutret aS ssmaê". A tawa$it n imcurak
wid ur nepzekki, u nitni nekôen laxeôt

Ini: "kunwi aql akwen la tnekôem Win Ixelqen tamurt, di sin wussan. La S tepparam nned. Wagi d Mass imavalen
Irra degs idurar sufella. Iôqa p, Iwzen degs tagwella s, di kué wussan. Akka i wid isteqsayen
Sinna, Izzi ar igenni i illan d abbu. Inna yas, u i tmurt: "aset ed, teb$am ne$ tugim"! Nnan: "a n nas, d imvuâen
Iseyya ten d ûa igenwan, di sin wussan. Iweêêa lameô is, i yal igenni. Ncebbeê igenni aqôib mavi, s teftilin, u d laânaya. D aya ay d Iqeddeô n Uzmir, Amusnaw
Ma numren, ini: "ssagwde$ kwen s ssiâqa, am ssiâqa n Âad u Tamud
Mi ten id usan imazanen, zdat sen, u deffir sen: "ur âabdet, siwa Öebbi"! Nnan: "lemmer i S ihwi i Mass nne$, a d Issers lmalayek. Nekwni, ihi, nenkeô ayen i s id teppuceggâam
Wanag Âad, sme$wôen iman nnsen di tmurt, ur klalen. Nnan: "anwa i $ i$elben di tezmert"? Day ur walan ara, Öebbi, iten id Ixelqen, I$elb iten di tezmert? Llan la nekôen issekniyen nne£
Nuzen asen aûeôûaô, deg ussan imevyaôen, iwakken a Nessukk fellasen, aâaqeb imdelli di tmeddurt n ddunit. Aâaqeb n laxeôt, war ccekk, isdullu kteô. Ur asen ippili umâiwen
Wanag Tamud, Nebbwi ten d ubrid. Smenyafen tider$elt i nnhaya. Tewwet iten ssiâqa n uâaqeb issrusun, ilmend n wayen keppben
Nsellek wid iumnen, i illan pêezziben
Ass ideg ara ssemlilen ar tmessi, icenga n Öebbi, nitni ad pwajemmlen

Ad Iâaqeb ixabiten, tixabitin, imcurak, timcurak, wid id ipfekkiôen Öebbi yir afekkeô. Izzi yasen ddens. Irfa Öebbi fellasen, Ixza ten. Ihegga yasen d Loahennama. A tu$alin tucmip
N Öebbi iâsekôiwen n tmurt akked igenwan. Öebbi Izga d Uzmir, d Bab n ûûwab
Ih, Nuzen ik id d anagi, d abcir, d aneddaô
iwakken a ppamnem s Öebbi akked Umazan iS, a T kfum, ad aS tanzem, a T tesbuccuâem taûebêit, tameddit
Wid iâaqden yidek âaqden kan d Öebbi. Afus n Öebbi nnig ufus nnsen. Win iêenten, d imanis kan i isseênet. Win iîîfen deg wayen i$ef iâuhed Öebbi, ad as Ifk arraz abarar

Ad ak inin wid igwran, seg uâôaben n ucluê: "i $ ice$wlen, d ayla nne$ akked twaculin nne$. Ssuter a neppusemmeê". Qqaôen s yilsawen nnsen, ayen ur nelli deg ulawen nnsen. Ini: "anwa ara kwen iselken si Öebbi, s wacemma, ma Ib$a yawen vveôô, ne$ ma Ib$a yawen aba$uô? Xaîi, Izga Öebbi Ippuxebbeô af wayen txeddmem
Xaîi, t$ilem Amazan akked lmumnin ur d ppu$alen ara, d awez$i, ar twaculin nnsen. Ayagi, issefôeê ulawen nnwen. Nnwaya nnwen dir ip. Kunwi d agdud imsenger
Wid ur numin s Öebbi, akked Umazan iS, ihi, aql a£ Nhegga d ajajiê i ijehliyen
N Öebbi, tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan. Ipsemmiê i win i S ihwan, Ipâuqub win i S ihwan. Öebbi Izga Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu

A d inin wid igwran: "ma tôuêem a d t$eltem, ooet a$ a neddu yidwen". B$an ad bedlen awalen n Öebbi. Ini: "ur teppeddum yidne$, d awez$i. Akka ay d izwar wawal n Öebbi". A d inin: "teêsedm a$"! Xaîi, cwiî kan ay fehhmen

Ini i wid igwran, seg uâôaben n ucluê: "a ppepwanecdem s agdud amaâwaôu, uqsiê; a t tenna$em, ne$ ad anzen. Ma tu$em awal, ad awen Ifk Öebbi arraz igerzen. Ma twexxôem, akken twexxôem uqbel, a kwen Iâaqeb s lqeôê
Ur telli tiyta deg uder$al, ne$ deg urejdal, ne$ deg umuvin. Win iunzen i Öebbi akked Umazan iS, a t Issekcem di leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen. Win iwexxôen, a t Iâaqeb s lqeôê
Ni$ Iôuva Öebbi lmumnin, mi âaqden yidek, seddaw ttejôa. Iéôa i illan deg ulawen nnsen, Issers d fellasen talwit, I$na ten s l$elb aqôib
akked waîas n lerbaê, ara îîfen. Öebbi Izga d Uzmir, d Bab n ûûwab
Iwaââed awen Öebbi a d teîîfem lerbaê aîas. I$awel awen d deg waya. Ikkes fellawen afus n medden. Akken ad yili ussekni i lmumnin, a kwen iawi d ubrid uwqim
Tayev, iwumi ur tezmirem, ihi, Izzi as Öebbi. Öebbi Izga Izmer i yal cci
Lemmer i kwen nnu$en wid ijehlen, ad rewlen, sinna, ur ppafen bab, ne$ asettaô
D tannumi n Öebbi i illan si zik. Ur teppafev abeddel, d awez$i, di tannumi n Öebbi
D Neppa i Ikksen afus nnsen segwen, akked ufus nnwen segsen, di te$zut n Mekka, siwev Iss$elb ikwen fellasen. Öebbi Izga Ipwali ayen txeddmem

D nitni i ijehlen. Swexxôen kwen si Loamaâ n Lêaôam, ugin ad iawev usfel s amkan is. Lemmer maççi d lmumnin, argaz tameîîut, ur ten tessinem, a ten têazem ur teéôim; segsen a d tegwrim di le$ôuô - ni$ Öebbi Issekcam s aêunu S, win i S ihwan - lemmer mfaôaqen, yili, war ccekk, Nesâadda, $ef wid segsen ijehlen, aâaqeb aqeôêan
Mi rran wid ijehlen, aêernun deg ulawen nnsen, aêernun n war tussna, Issers ed Öebbi talwit iS af Umazan iS, akked lmumnin. Iqqen asen awal uêezzeb. Iwata ten, klalen t. Öebbi Izga Iéôa yal cci

Ni$ Issawev Öebbi, i Umazan iS, tamu$li s tidep: war ccekk, a pkecmem Loamaâ n Lêaôam, ma Irad Öebbi, di laman, iqweôôa nnwen ûûeîlen u qeôcen, ur teppagwadem. Iéôa ayen ur teéôim. Ihegga yawen d, ugwar aya, l$elb aqôib
Neppa id Iuznen Amazan iS s nnhaya, akked ddin n tidep, iwakken a t Issifrer $ef ddin meôôa. Iqadd Öebbi d Anagi

Muêemmed d Amazan n Öebbi. Wid illan yides, qesêen ar ijehliyen, êninit garasen. A ten twaliv îîinizen, kennun, ssuturen lfevl s$uô Öebbi akked llza. Ccama nnsen, deg udmawen nnsen, d lateô n lekni. Ata wayen i ten icban di Tuôa akked wayen i ten icban di Linoil: am uâaqqa, iger ed im$i s, isoehd it. Ad iuzur, ad iâaooeô $ef yile$ is. Ippaâoab ifellaêen; i$webben yissen ijehliyen. Iwaââed Öebbi ssmaê akked warraz abarar, i wid degsen iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan
A wid iumnen! Ur zeggwiret zdat Öebbi akked Umazan iS. Ëezzbet i Öebbi. Öebbi, s tidep, Issel, d Amusnaw
A wid iumnen! Ur zzuhriyet tu$ac nnwen, sennig ta$wect n Nnbi. Ur zaââvet $uôes, akken tepzaââvam garawen, mulac ad mêun igiten nnwen, kunwi ur tfaqem
Ih, wid issrusun ûut n ta$wect nnsen, ar Umazan n Öebbi, d wid iwumi Issefsi Öebbi ulawen nnsen, ar uêezzeb. Ad asen ippunefk ssmaê akked warraz abarar
Ih, tegwti n wid ik n issawlen, deffir texxamin, ur pmeyyizen
Lemmer ûbiôen ard teff$ev $uôsen, ppif i nitni. Öebbi Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
A wid iumnen! Aballa$ ma ibbwi yawen d asali, ppuêeqqeqet, mulac a pvuôôem agdud, war tamusni, a ppu$alem tnedmem deg wayen txedmem

Cfut illa garawen Umazan n Öebbi. Ma issemêes awen deg waîas n lumuô, a pjafem. Maca, Öebbi Issaâzez awen liman, Imelleê it deg ulawen nnwen, Isseôéeg awen tijehli, dd$el, lmaâûegga. Widak d wid ipwanhan
D lfevl s$uô Öebbi, d l$it. Öebbi Iéôa, d Bab n ûûwab

Ma nnu$ent snat n îayfat n lmumnin, êuddet pent. Ma tebw$ev yiwet degsent, $ef tayev, nna$et tin ibwe$ven alamma tevfeô lameô n Öebbi. Ma tevfeô it, ssemûalêet pent, s lmizan. Wezznet. Öebbi Iêemmel wid iwezznen
Lmumnin d atmaten kan i illan. Ssemûalêet atmaten nnwen, êezzbet i Öebbi, amar fellawen aêunu

A wid iumnen! £uôwat ad imaâlek ugdud $ef wayev, ahat d widen i ten yifen. Ne$ tilawin $ef tiyav, ahat d tiden i tent yifen. Ur pqeôôidet iman nnwen, ur pmirgamet s tselleqwbin. Dir it isem n dd$el, anda illa liman. Wid ur nutub ara, d widak ay d imednas

A wid iumnen! Janbet aîas n nnwaya. Ih, nnwaya, tikwal, d abekkav. Ur ppemâassat ara. Ur kkatet wa deg wa. Day ib$u yiwen, degwen, ad içç aksum n gmas lmegget? A t tagwim. Ëezzbet i Öebbi. Ih, Öebbi Issuruf, Ipêunu
A yimdanen! Ni$ Nxelq ikwen si ddker akked nnta. Nerra kwen d igduden, d laâôac, a ppemyussanem. Ihi, ukyis nnwen amxallef, ar Öebbi, d win degwen ipêezziben sennig wiyav. Ih, Öebbi Iéôa, Ippuxebbeô

Nnan uâôaben n ucluê: "numen". Ini: "ur tuminem". Maca init ed: "nunez"; ur ikcim ara liman ar wulawen nnwen. Ma tôuvam Öebbi akked Umazan iS, ur awen Isôuêu acemma seg igiten nnwen. Öebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Lmumnin d wid kan iumnen s Öebbi akked Umazan iS, d$a, ur pcukun. Pna$en s wayla nnsen akked yiman nnsen, deg ubrid n Öebbi. D widak ay d imawlan n tidep
Ini: "day ad aS temlem i Öebbi, ddin nnwen"? Öebbi Iéôa i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. Öebbi Issen yal cci
Rran ak annuz nnsen, d tajmilt. Ini: "ur iyi telli tejmilt deg annuz nnwen. Xaîi, d Öebbi ikwen I$aten mi kwen Inha ar liman, ma d imawlan n tidep ay tellam
Ih, Öebbi Issen tabavnit n tmurt akked igenwan. Öebbi Ipwali ayen txeddmem
